description.value:
Level 7 Transmutation

Casting Time: 1 action

Range: undefined touch

Components: V, S, M

Duration: Permanent

With a touch, you magically sequester an object or a willing creature. For the duration, the target has the Invisible|XPHB condition and can't be targeted by Divination spells, detected by magic, or viewed remotely with magic. If the target is a creature, it enters a state of suspended animation; it has the Unconscious|XPHB condition, doesn't age, and doesn't need food, water, or air. You can set a condition for the spell to end early. The condition can be anything you choose, but it must occur or be visible within 1 mile of the target. Examples include "after 1,000 years" or "when the tarrasque awakens." This spell also ends if the target takes any damage.

_srdData.name: Sequester

m.text: gem dust worth 5,000+ GP, which the spell consumes
